content: a dovecot is a historic structure that contained openings for pigeons and doves to nest the interlock transition row on this shawl reminded me of the openings in the dovecots created in standard crochet most of the shawl is double_crochet with simple interlock crochet used only for the transition between colors as pictured this shawl is made from 800yds of berroco ultra wool fine but other fingering weight yarns can be used the pattern is simple and well suited to using up remnants as the number of row per color can be easily modified as pictured colors and yardage used include a
